comment.brief: Nothing special happens when the page is prepared
comment.full: Nothing special happens when the page is prepared

comment.brief: The page is marked busy for a couple of frames when prepared, thus deferring navigation
comment.full: The page is marked busy for a couple of frames when prepared, thus deferring navigation

comment.brief: Allows marking a page as busy when it is first prepared. This can improve navigation animations as the first preparation frames will happen prior to the transition.
comment.full:
Allows marking a page as busy when it is first prepared. This can improve navigation animations as the first preparation frames will happen prior to the transition.

The default is `FrameDelay`
